alert.note: Alert for Allen (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Allen County through 630 PM EDT... At 548 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lima to near Sidney. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lima, Fort Shawnee, Harrod, Beaverdam, Yoder, Westminster, Hume, Slabtown, Kemp and Rousculp. This includes Interstate 75 between mile markers 119 and 138. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
